column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////JINYA is always a good choice. My last visit we went in on a Friday night
column2: and had to wait 45 minutes. Not too bad since we found a spot at the bar. Once our table was ready we shifted to our seats. Ramen always good
column3: I would not think there is anything overly special about the Ramen here. Its good
column5: and there is a great atmosphere.
